note: Epidemiologist, working on mathematical models applied to infectious diseases, I am a climate researcher, I hunt mosquitoes and other rare creatures. Anarchist, sin fronteras, feminist, antifa, digital protection. Deep loves: Caves, mountains, nature, movies that mess with your brain (a little). I write poetry when I'm in a bad mood, but they quickly make me laugh. I'm in favor of autonomy but I'm taking on the "worst fried egg in the world" challenge.
